Ingredient:
Baking powder double acting
Rule: 1 teaspoon for every 1 cup flour

Substitute.ingredient_name: cube dissolved in 1 cup boiling water
powdered broth base dissolved in 1 cup boiling water
instant espresso powder dissolved in 3 tablespoons hot water
unflavored gelatin in 3 tablespoons cold water&&

Ingredient:
Flour all-purpose
Note: Specialty flours added to yeast bread recipes will result in a reduced volume and heavier product.

Substitute.ingredient_name: corn syrup in a double broiler

Ingredient: Mayonnaise (for use in salads and salad dressings)

Substitute.ingredient_name: similar nuts(your favorite) prepared in the same way
another nut butter(such as almond or hazelnut butter)
other dried fruit(chopped into small pieces)
cooking oil(cooking oil should not be substituted if recipe does not call for melted shortening)
granulated white sugar processed in a food processor or grinder
brown sugar (light or dark) firmly packed
